newsitem.title: UK: Key stock and currency market movements at 1700 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Key stock and currency market movements at 1700 GMT.

text.p: The following table shows the latest close of key indices* on major world stock exchanges, the day's change in points and the indices' 1996/97 closing highs and lows (with dates). Also shown are the London closing values of the German mark, the Japanese yen, the British pound and gold bullion (previous day's closes in brackets):
- - - - FOREIGN EXCHANGE/GOLD BULLION CLOSE IN LONDON Dollar/mark... 1.6878 (1.6877)

Pound/dollar.. $1.6200 ($1.6235) Gold (ounce).. $343.05 ($341.85) - - - - *INDICES USED AND THEIR ALL-TIME CLOSING HIGHS New York Dow Jones industrial average -- 7,022.44 (Feb 13/97) London FTSE 100 index -- 4,341.0 (Feb 14/97) Tokyo Nikkei average -- 38,915.87 (Dec 29/89) Frankfurt DAX-3O index -- 3,248.18 (Feb 14/97) Paris CAC-40 General index -- 2,628.41 (Feb 13/97) Sydney Australian All-Ordinaries index -- 2,496.40 (Feb 13/97) Hong Kong Hang Seng index -- 13,868.24 (Jan 20/97)
